name: Terminal Snake
description:
This is a snake at its most classic. Except for the fact that it is a snake in a terminal format. Bring back an ounce of nostalgia, which may not exist. But let the nostalgia of the first games soak in!

Controls:

  • Up move - Up Arrow
  • Down move - Down Arrow
  • Left move - Left Arrow
  • Right move - Right Arrow

Code repository: https://github.com/Szarin/Snake-Console-Game-Csharp
